Package org.apache.hadoop.io.compress

Removed Classes
LzoCodec A org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec for a streaming lzo compression/decompression pair.
LzopCodec A org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec for a streaming lzo compression/decompression pair compatible with lzop.
LzopCodec.LzopDecompressor  
LzopCodec.LzopInputStream  
LzopCodec.LzopOutputStream  
 

Added Classes
BlockCompressorStream A org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressorStream which works with 'block-based' based compression algorithms as opposed to 'stream-based' compression algorithms.
BlockDecompressorStream A org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DecompressorStream which works with 'block-based' based compression algorithms as opposed to 'stream-based' compression algorithms.
CompressorStream  
DecompressorStream  
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
BZip2Codec This class provides CompressionOutputStream and CompressionInputStream for compression and decompression.
CompressionCodec This class encapsulates a streaming compression/decompression pair.
CompressionCodecFactory A factory that will find the correct codec for a given filename.
DefaultCodec  
GzipCodec This class creates gzip compressors/decompressors.
